pageTitle: Snow - Thomas the Tank Engine Wikia
textBeforeTable: In other languages When Thomas talks to Percy, his eyes are wonky. When the trucks are on the incline, the front truck has a narrow-gauge truck face, but when it crashes through the buffers it has a standard-gauge truck face. A truck is missing when they fall into the ravine. When the trucks crash through the snow bank and buffers they are coupled, but they fall one by one. When the trucks race down the incline, the middle truck derails. In various scenes, part of Skarloey's cab roof is snapped. Goofs The last episode narrated by Manfred Steffen in Germany, Gérard Boucaron in France and Diego Brizzi in Latin America, and the last episode to be narrated by Tatá Guarnieri in Brazil until Hero of the Rails. The last episode produced by The Britt Allcroft Company David Maidment's last episode as railway consultant. Angus Wright's last episode as executive producer. Britt Allcroft's last episode as producer and writer. This was the last episode of a few things: Going by Production Order, this is the Twenty-fifth episode of the Fifth Season.
